solution_line_template: Grace mowed lawns for {hours_mowing} hours at ${charge_mowing}/hour, so earned {hours_mowing} * {charge_mowing} = $<<{hours_mowing}*{charge_mowing}={earned_mowing}>>{earned_mowing}.
Grace pulled weeds for {hours_weeding} hours at ${charge_weeding}/hour, so earned {hours_weeding} * {charge_weeding} = $<<{hours_weeding}*{charge_weeding}={earned_weeding}>>{earned_weeding}.

Grace put down mulch for {hours_mulching} hours at ${charge_mulching}/hour, so earned {hours_mulching} * {charge_mulching} = $<<{hours_mulching}*{charge_mulching}={earned_mulching}>>{earned_mulching}.
